name: Sweet Soy Sauce For Korean Fried Chicken
description: A sweet garlicky soy-based sauce for Korean-style fried chicken.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup mirin or other sweet rice cooking wine
1/2 teaspoon crushed dried red pepper (preferably Korean kochukaru, see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat soy sauce, vinegar, mirin, brown sugar, garlic, ginger, crushed red pepper, and sesame oil in a small saucepan over medium heat, whisking until sugar is dissolved. Combine corn starch with 1 tablespoon water in a small bowl and whisk into sauce. Bring to a boil and cook until sauce is slightly reduced and thickened, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool for 5 minutes. Serve with Korean Fried Chicken.
